lead_paragraph: McCAFFREY--Susan Mary, age 59, a resident of the PGA National Golf Community, Palm Beach Gardens, and a former resident of Riverdale, New York, passed away on Friday, January 8, 2016. She is a daughter of the late Honorable Francis J. McCaffrey, Sr. and Irene McCaffrey. Susan was a graduate of the University of Notre Dame, Maryland, and worked in the financial business for over 25 years. She was Research Coordinator for the Institutional Trading Desk at E.F. Hutton; Head Equity Trader at New York Life; Equity Trader at Greenwich Street Advisors; Investment Advisor with Paine Webber, Inc., and most recently, Research Technical Salesperson with Lowery Research Corporation. Susan was a member of the PGA Member's Club where she was an enthusiastic croquet player. She was also a member of the Shelter Island Yacht Club and the Gardiners Bay Golf Club, both in New York. Susan enjoyed the arts and was a talented and avid artist. Susan is survived by her sister, Joan Patton of Boston, MA; two brothers, Francis J. McCaffrey, Jr. of Floral Park, New York and David McCaffrey, Sr. of Cambridge, MA; and four nephews, Joseph Patton, III, Luke Patton, Francis McCaffrey, and David McCaffrey, Jr. If you wish, donations can be made in Susan's name to Hospice of Palm Beach County Foundation: C.W. Gerstenberg Hospice, 5300 East Avenue, West Palm Beach, FL 33407. A memorial service is planned in the spring for family and friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCCAFFREY, SUSAN MARY
